title: Add density Stream Evaluator
description:
The density function will implement the probability density function (PDF) for multivariate distributions. The univariate distributions have the easier to interpret probability function so for the initial release the density function will only be supported for multvariate distributions.

Implementation provided by Apache Commons Math.
